name: uport-mock-client
description: Mocks the functionality of the uport mobile client

scripts.deploy-id: (cd node_modules/uport-identity && truffle migrate --network ganache) && cp -r node_modules/uport-identity/build/contracts contracts
scripts.deploy-registry: (cd node_modules/uport-registry && truffle migrate --network ganache --prevAddr none) && cp node_modules/uport-registry/build/contracts/UportRegistry.json contracts/UportRegistry.json
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-id && npm run deploy-registry
